text:
Owner is very nice. Owner gave us the boil eat very nice. I think like the Korean food is very nice so much must try this place. My Daddy friends from Korean must bring your family and friends and auntie and uncle .  Owner is here i will come back again. Fried chicken is very soft very nice. Owner work
In KoCoDak-Korean restaurant. I will come back again soon thanks for chefs to cook for us dinner so much üòã ‚ù§Ô∏è üòÄ I will vote 500 star üåü ü§©

We tried the fried chicken and cold noodles, and both were excellent. The fried chicken was perfectly crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, while the cold noodles had a delightful QQ texture and a flavorful taste!

Definitely worth a visit!

The food was very good and authentic. The batter of the fried chicken is a bit different from what I am used to, but it is still nice and crispy for a wet batter. Noodles were delicious and chewy and full of flavour. Highly recommended to come here to get your Korean fix :)

Great ambient n large TV with great Cartoon for kids. A nice soft spoken waiter took our order. Liked his attitude very calm.

The food were great. Especially the boneless  fried chickens they were really good. Kids enjoyed the udon.

One of the best place for korean fried chicken, fresh and yummy! Will come again next time when i "miss" the fried chickenüçóü§§
